[[=]]
[[span class="thin"]]
We are compiling information about the body of Makuwa Yurika, who committed suicide on 20██/██/██. Thank you for your cooperation.
[[/span]]
[[/=]]
[[tabview]]
[[tab Summary]]
Corpse Corpus is a compilation of information (corpus) about Makuwa Yurika's corpse (corpse). We await any information you can provide.
[[/tab]]
[[tab Rule 1]]
All works in this series must be an SCP containing the statement "SCP-XXXX-JP is the corpse of Makuwa Yurika, who committed suicide on 20██/██/██." on the first line of the description, or must be an SCP, tale, or GoI format already associated with an SCP that forms part of this series.

[[collapsible show="+Template for adding to the hub" hide="-Close"]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
@@[[include component:image-block@@
@@name=[Link to a picture of Makuwa Yurika before death]|@@
@@caption=[Name of and link to work]|@@
@@width=150px(Please use a sensible vertical length.)| @@
@@align=left@@
@@]]@@
@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@
@@@@@@@@
[[/div]]
If a picture is not added before submission, one will be added after some time.
Tales, GoIFs, artworks, etc. will only be added to the Works tab. Remember that.
[[/collapsible]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Rule 2]]
--Please be sure to make Mawuka Yurika's suicide meaningful and valuable.--Disregard this rule.
[[/tab]]
